author: Pmeiring
body:
#### PR description:

This backport PR introduces the new CALO-L2 Tau isolation LUT for 2025 post-TS1 pp data-taking. Apart from the pointers to the LUT (tauIsoLUTFile and tauIsoLUTFile2), the caloParams file is identical to caloParams_2025_v0_2.

The LUT is the "baseline" version from this JIRA ticket, which also contains all validation studies:
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-1395

This PR depends on:
https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter/pull/29

#### PR validation:

See backport PR.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is a backport PR to CMSSW_15_0_X. The corresponding original PR is: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48482
title: [15_0_X][L1T] Update L1 Tau isolation LUT
